commands.name: get-cat-images
commands.title: Search Cat Images
commands.description: Fetch a random cat image and add it to your favorites.

commands.name: search-favorites
commands.title: Search Favorites
commands.subtitle: Cat Images
commands.description: Search for your favorite cat images.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
